hero.title: Great Beginnings Day Care
hero.subtitle: Where Every Child's Journey Begins with Love, Learning, and Laughter
hero.description: Providing quality childcare and early education in a nurturing environment for children aged 6 weeks to 12 years in Roselle, Illinois. Our experienced educators bring 25+ years of expertise to nurture your child's growth.

about.title: About Great Beginnings
about.subtitle: A Decade of Excellence in Roselle
about.description: At Great Beginnings Day Care, we believe every child deserves a safe, nurturing environment where they can grow, learn, and thrive. Since acquiring the center in 2014, our owners have brought their 25+ years of childcare expertise to provide exceptional services to families in Roselle and surrounding communities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide high-quality, affordable childcare in a warm, loving environment that promotes each child's social, emotional, physical, and cognitive development.

values.title: Our Values
values.safety: Safety First - Your child's wellbeing is our top priority
values.learning: Learning Through Play - Educational activities that make learning fun
values.family: Family Partnership - Working together for your child's success
values.community: Community Connection - Building relationships that last

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Age-Appropriate Programs Designed for Every Stage

infant.title: Infant Care
infant.description: Loving, individualized care for your littlest ones with flexible scheduling to meet your baby's needs.

toddler.title: Toddler Program
toddler.description: Active learning through play, exploration, and social interaction to build independence and confidence.

preschool.title: Preschool Program
preschool.description: Kindergarten readiness program focusing on academic skills, social development, and independence.
features: Fine and gross motor skill development

afterschool.title: After School Care
afterschool.description: Safe, supervised environment with homework help, activities, and nutritious snacks after school.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Visit Us Today - Tours Welcome!
contact.description: We'd love to meet you and your family. Contact us to schedule a tour or learn more about our programs.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.name: Your Name
form.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again or call us directly.

enrollment.subtitle: Join Our Daycare Family Today
